cit.quote: The Royal A~ of Arts

sense.def: help, especially money, food or other gifts given to people living in difficult conditions

cit.quote: aid to the earth-quake zone
an aid worker

sense.note: (NOTE: This meaning of aid has no plural.)

cit.quote: We give money in aid of the Red Cross.
They are collecting money in aid of refugees.

sense.def: thing which helps you to do something

cit.quote: kitchen aids

sense.def: Que pertence ou viveu numa época anterior.
Pessoa que é ascendente de outra ou outras.

cit.quote: Certos povos crêem-se descendentes de um antepassado comum. o vaqueiro, pai do vaqueiro, o avô e outros antepassados mais antigos haviam-se acostumado a percorrer veredas, afastando o mato com as mãos.
Hérdamos estes costumes dos nossos antepassados.
Culto dos antepassados.

sense.def: to catch and hold someone who has broken the law

cit.quote: The police arrested two men and took them to the police station.
He ended up getting arrested as he tried to leave the country.
She was arrested for stealing.

sense.def: the act of holding someone for breaking the law

cit.quote: The police made several arrests at the demonstration.
After the fight, three people were under arrest.

sense.def: o que pertence a uma corporação com a obrigatoriedade de acudir a incêndios, acidentes, unicamente por filantropia
make a cry or sound of this kind

form.orth: eat someone out of house and home
get on like a house on fire

cit.quote: Le matin j'ouvre au chien et je lui fais manger sa soupe. Le soir je lui siffle de venir se coucher
In the morning, I open the door for the dog, and I

6. Les fleuristes, murmura Lorilleux, toutes des Marie-couche-toi-là. Eh bien! Et moi? reprit la grande veuve, les lèvres pincées. Vous êtes galant. Vous savez, je ne suis pas une chienne, je ne me mets pas les pattes en l'air, quand on siffle!
elle était horrifiée par la dépense
she was horrified at the expense
The sun affects all living things (=people, animals, and plants).
A living language (=one that people still use)
الجملُ
الجملُ

sense.def: شجر ذو شوك. طويل الساق، كثير الورق و الأغصان. خوَّار العود تتَّخذ منه المساويكِ

cit.quote: الجرحُ

sense.def: شجرة باسقة من فصيلة الصنوبريَّات.منبتها الاصلي٠ اميركا الجنوبية، تزرع في الحدائق للزينة، اوراقها شائكة تنبت حتى على الجذع

cit.quote: الكرم

sense.def: ما أُحيط بهِ على شيءٍ كالكرم و النخل

cit.quote: الفرسَ
ــ الرجُل

sense.def: као укор или поруга, и ваља да значи: којему је мајка била грдна
украс на глави као знак владарске власти;
новчана јединица у неким европским земљама, разне вредности.
део лиснатог дрвета изнад стабле (гране и лшће);
врхунац, највиши домет неког рада, забаве.

cit.quote: „Ду́ни, ве́тре, се́јче леб да пе́че”
cit.usg: (рекла сељанка на њиви за време врућине)
